content.detailedDescription:
This isn't much of a story. 

i was given some photos of a delivery truck that was going to get a facelift as far as the graphics go. so as i was getting familiar with the selection of images, i decided that the shot taken of the side would be useful to get the right proportion for the design.

as i zoomed in to look at the truck surface i noticed a light or highlight in the sky above the truck even with the back edge about 2" inches above.

it does have a metallic sphere shape with a good highlight and shadow area. 

i thought it was interesting.
content.summary: Discovery of unusual object in photo.

content.detailedDescription:
Last week while out at my summer cottage near lake erie in western new york state, i was walking my dog out at about 8:00 p.M.   the sun was just beginning to go down behind the trees, casting a beautiful fractured light on the front of the house.  in the distance could be heard the sound of my neighbors atv driving around the undeveloped wetlands adjacent to my property. 

suddenly my dog began acting erratically, pulling on the leash to go back inside and turning his head toward the sky, looking this way and that.  i spoke to him asking what was wrong and looked around to see what was disturbing him, other than the noise in the woods.  that is when i saw a peculiar winged creature flying from out of the woods across the front of the house.

the creature���s wings were about three inches across.  the wings were transparent and rounded at the ends.  if you formed a ���c��� with your thumb and forefinger and then touched your thumb nails together, you would have a rough estimation of the shape of the rear wings of the creature.  the wings were not fluttering like a butterfly or vibrating like a dragonfly, which are two common insects in my yard.  the creature was gliding, with perhaps a slight vibration.  

i only saw the creature for the length of time it took to fly to the end of the house.  once it got beyond the house into the open area of the front yard, it disappeared.   my eyes were on it the whole time.

i was not able to see any of its body, just the back wings from below as described above.  by the shape of the wings i assumed it was a four winged creature.  my thought after the being disappeared was, ���that must be what people see when they say they have seen a fairy.��� 

i felt elated seeing this creature.  it was nothing i had ever seen before.
content.summary: Transparent to invisible living creature.

content.detailedDescription:
It was a busy night star gazing as i saw numerous unusual sky phenomena between scorpio and corona borealis. all this took place between 9 p.M. and 10:30 p.M. local time.

around 9 p.M. i went out for my evening star gazing and watching the satellites go by. i live in a small town so this is exciting :-)

at the start i saw what i can only describe as flashes of light in the sky. the flashes of light looked like a flash from a camera. then i observed what i thought was a satellite until the satellite went from moving from a northern to southern direction to veering to a southwesterly direction. satellites do not normally change their directional course as they can not. they always move in the same direction without veering off course. this satellite seemed to be dark gray in color and was silhouetted against the night sky. i saw this with my naked eye.

then i saw the similar flashes of light again. after this i saw another "satellite" that was moving across the sky. this time the satellite stopped, then let off a "pouf" of periwinkle to white color, then moved again. i observed through binocs what seemed to be a lighted object with periwinkle and white lights. this satellite then moved and faded away. approximately a half hour later this same satellite reappeared towards the southwest portion of the sky and repeated the same set of movements and colorations before fading out.

i saw the flashes of light each time before the bluish white satellite reappeared.

i checked heavens above and could find nothing that might fit what we saw. perhaps you can find something.

none of this stuff was close. it was all probably just inside the earth's atmosphere at a good guess.
content.summary: Two ufos observed with light flashes.

content.detailedDescription: 11:31pm i saw what appeared to be a giant explosion in the distant night sky, it lasted a fraction of a second. i was located around n 46������ 34.652 w 087������ 28.644 the explosion was near the handle of the little dipper. there are few city lights and it was not a firework. what struck me as odd was that i was looking right at it when it happened because there were a bunch of shooting stars in the same small area just minutes prior. the light itself was like a fireball maybe a tenth the size of the moon and it pulsated once, and when it "exploded it was like a spiral coming right at me. it made my body tingle like lightning does but that was probably just the shock of seeing it.
content.summary: Shooting stars, then fireball.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down bradmary lake rd one evening in earl aug. 2005 and off to the left i saw a sphere like object hoovering just above tree line. it was strange because it seemed to spin in 2 directions both around and over (if that makes sense). anyway i stopped the car and watched it~ it did not last long 15 sec. or so. then it just disappeared! and it made no sound at all! i kinda coughed it up to fort gordon property backing up to mine~ maybe this was a man made object~ i don't know~ but i know i did see it what ever it was.
content.summary: Sorta round - kinda redish lights- not real bright.

content.detailedDescription:
Standing outside my motel room having a coffee, when i spotted a starlike object appearing from above the roof over hang, after a few seconds followed by another one.
these objects were traveling in a straight line
these passed over at the height off a low flying small plane, but much faster
it took me half a a minute or so before i realized that these could not be a plane or helicopter, as no sound was to be heard, and a plane or helicopter has different, or flashing lights
the lights were like white light, and so bright that you could not make out a form.
as the objects were so low, it only took a couple off minutes before i lost sight off them, behind some houses
it was a calm and clear early morning, and i wished i would have had a camera
content.summary: Two star like objects passing over.

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i were standing outside talking when i noticed what i thought was a plane going over head as is passed over it stayed a bright light,i did not see the body of a plane.It seemed to twinkle or sparkle , it was beautiful bright white star like.It was the size of a golf ball when held out at arms length,i said there is no sound , and my friend noticed that it seemed to move like a mouse(mini zizag and pauses).It was moving in a northerly direction perpendicular to the rising full moon. i think the iss was coming from the north west that night. what ever it was it was beautiful.
i was so excited that i ran inside and grabbed a couple of women to come see. they were perplexed and couldn't say what it was,one was sure it was a satellite. i completely disagreed . i know what a satellite looks like and that was not it. i walked my friend back to her car and saw a light coming from the direction of the object's path.I was so excited , but i noticed the light was different it was a little yellowish and then saw that it was a plane .It was nice though, to have something to compare the object to.
content.summary: Bright white star like.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on i465 on the east side of indianapolis. i took note of the time which was exactly 10:15 a.M. as i looked at the clock on my satellite radio. i was about one or two miles south of u.S.40 (washington street) i saw straight ahead of me a cylindrical object flying west pretty much parallel to the horizon. the position of the sun at that hour and the clarity of the atmosphere made the object gleam a brilliant white. about a month ago we had seen a cylinder going up in the sky which we were never able to see wings on. it looked like a cylinder with a band around it. that sighting coupled with how bright this object made me keep my focus on it even though i was certain it was a plane on it's glide path for indianapolis international. i lived in that part of indy for several years and had seen planes on that glide path many times but i wanted to watch it long enough to see the wings. then i caught sight of a brilliant white sphere well above the plane travelling in a downward path at an angle from about 1 o'clock to 8 o'clock. at first glance it appeared to be on a collision course with the plane but in just a few seconds it became clear that if it continued on it's same trajectory it would be far behind the plane by the time it reached that level. i watched it for about 15 seconds and then it faded away. i say faded but it went from brilliant to gone in less than 2 seconds but still you could tell it was going to become unable to be seen before it did. i am a mufon f.I. so i read the last 20 reports daily. this sphere disappeared exactly like the orb did during the first few seconds of the video 0016 reported 6/30/2010. i thought it might be the first daytime meteor i've ever seen but at that trajectory it was moving too slow to be a meteor.
content.summary: Spherical object very  bright white in direct sunlight.

content.detailedDescription:
Cigar/cylinder/capsule video capture silent daytime clear sighting multiple events.  this was filmed on june 3, 2010 at 7:48 pm in wilton, ny...Saratoga county on northern pines rd  and is one of several captures of this capsule type ufo that i see repeatedly and could also be classified as cigar shaped or cylindrical.  in 1998 *(name deleted--sgonzalez/cms) fort ticonderoga, ny sighting with video capture next to church steeple was on the cover of many ufo magazines.  this flying tube has been captured by many people who post on you tube from around the world and can be seen on my yt channel cosmicdramaqueen the playlist is called ufo cigar cylinder capsule tube .

i was driving home when i stopped to admire the wild flowers in a field on northern pines rd, i was contemplating picking some while i listened to the birds...And then i saw the familiar flying white tube, so i hopped back to my truck, grabbed the camera and filmed this one for a long time.  elevation was well under 5000' and was approximately 1/2 to 3/4 of a mile with in view.  i was facing east and it was flying from the south heading due north.  i had this ufo in my sites for so long and because i captured this on several occasions, i got a little bored, so i panned out to show the field and then resumed the filming as it angled away towards the north east.  many people will "hang on" to the idea that this is a plane....Nope...Absolutely silent...No wings...No tail....Watch the video closely from beginning to end and you too will see that the lack of wings and tail section is not an optical illusion.

i will continue to report and share in the disclosure process because if we wait for an official announcement....Well, we could possible wait another 60 years.  it is we, the people who have to accept the reality that ufos are real and are here... and then help the one's who are too afraid to understand this reality!  peace to all beings.
content.summary: Cigar/cylinder/capsule video capture silent daytime clear sighting multiple events.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: During my evening walk, i spotted this object approximately five miles high in the western sky. i have seen this same object in the same location at the same times for approximately two weeks prior to this report. it did not move from its location, was brighter and seemingly lower than anything else in the entire sky. to the naked eye, it appears to be a flying saucer. when viewed in photographs, it takes many different shapes. i, personally, am not afraid of aliens and/or ufos, but i got the distinct impression that "it" did not like being photographed. as of the submission of this report, it is still in the sky.
content.shape: Circle,   Disc,   Oval,   Saturn-like,   Star-like,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Bright, shape-shifting object stationary in night's sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Stopped for a smoke on the way to work, looked up, saw what i thought was a plane.  looked closely, it was a bright white disc, very high in the atmosphere, rather large in relation to how high this thing was.  my guess is 40,000-60,000 feet based upon the average view of high altitude jetliners.  

what got me was that there were no wings or jet contrails and it was traveling oddly, seemingly on a descent.  the object was traveling towards the south-southwest at a good clip, in a straight line.  as i watched it several contrail-like trails were emitted from it at intervals, as if the craft was skipping along the sky.  the object appeared to speed up as it traveled south and went beyond the tree tops.

if you glanced at it, you thought it was a plane.  if you looked closely, it was very different and difficult to explain.  i'm no crazy and i know what planes, helicopters and other aerial phenomenon look like.  this may have been terrestrial in origin, but it was very unidentified and unusual.

anyone else out there see this object?
content.summary: Large white disc, high altitude, traveling south.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my car north on main st going to work, i passed under the 405 fwy and noticed a flying object with two trails coming from the rear of it. i could tell it was far away. i stopped to take a few pictures and decided to drive up a bit more for a better view point. at one point a plane much closer to me fly's past in my pictures (perfect!) this was while the sun was setting. i wear glasses so it was hard for me to see what i  was looking at. however it flew directly over head and lost its trails only to become a glowing red dot. after that i lost track of it. it sure confused me. and whats more i have seen it closer before this around lax while on the 405.  and still could not figure out what it was. i would love to know as i took good pictures of it at 10.2mp, i had to use full digital zoom to get the closer shots of it. i felt normal, excited to catch it on camera finally. the shock came when i zoomed in on it. i would guess it was something launched in to space. but i am not an expert and its weird to have this type of air traffic around lax.. i am not sure what the object was when i first saw it, hence the pictures, and i have seen it to objects like it before in different places around the south bay area. the object remained on a steady course the whole time. it went from over the pacific ocean east towards me and then over me going east and fading from my line of sight. i lost track of it after its trails vanished and it turned in to a small red dot in the sky.
content.summary: Driving north on main st. i noticed long trails on something flying, stopped & took pictures from 2 angles.

content.detailedDescription: Around midnight on july 1st 2010 i was looking at the sky, which was cloudless, when i spotted an object far from the horizon, which resembled a star, but was moving relatively fast. it looked like it was high in the atmosphere. the sight lasted for a few seconds, when the object just disappeared. i stress again that there wasn't a single cloud in the sky, so the ufo couldn't have went behind one.
content.summary: A star-like object moving fast high in the atmosphere.

content.detailedDescription: My friend *(initials deleted--sgonzalez/cms)wanted to take me to this cool bar called marge's right on the beach in rochester ny. the bar is an old house, the size of the bar is about the size of a bedroom, but the real reason people go there is for the scene outside. its a very chill bar, where you can go to the backyard of the bar, grab a lawn chair and find a spot on the beach. up till that point, i have never been there but heard a lot about it, so we went. got some beers, and went straight to the back. we were sitting on the beach, and i was taking it all in. it was decently crowded but not packed. the night was beautiful, not a cloud in the sky, and the sun was almost going down. not only 5 minutes of being there that i put my head back, looked straight up and saw 2 circled ufo's fly right above me. they were side by side, and the right one looked like it was trying to go faster than the other (almost like 2 cars racing on the street). i looked over to *(initials deleted--sgonzalez/cms) and was about to say something but before i could even get it out i decided not to say anything. they were gone, and i didnt know what to say. i could not believe what i saw. the flying objects appeared to be complete circles, same size, and their color was the actual color of the sky at the time which was a yellowish white. (almost like they had camouflage). when i realized they were gone, i looked around to see if anyone else noticed what i saw, but it looked like no one did. my heart was pounding, and i was trying to put together in my mind what just happened. i thought maybe they could have been stealths(ive never seen any fly) but they were going way to fast, and like i said, the right one seemed to be racing with the left one. i know this happened a year ago but i havent been able to stop thinking about it. the flying objects seemed to be on an actual route almost like they use it all the time. i now live in west hollywood, but i recently talked to one of my old co-workers (who i told about the incident before) and she told me that her friends were there one night just a few weeks ago, and both saw ufo's. she explained their experience not the same as mine, but they saw lights over the lake(lake ontario). i wish i didn't wait this long to report this, and i wish i went back to marge's before i moved out west, but i wish i could go back. because i swear, if you sit out there one night, someone might see the samething, i swear that the flying objects seemed like they were on a direct path (almost like they use it all the time). flying straight north right over lake ontario into canada.
content.summary: 2 ufos flying straight over lake ontario (almost looked like it was a route).

content.detailedDescription:
While sitting around a small camp fire talking and watching overhead for satellites with our neighbors we observed a soccer ball size reddish/orange light approach us from the south (about 185 degrees) at approximately 3000 feet make a u-turn and depart south (about 175 degrees). about a minute later another one followed the same path or it could have been the same one making a second circuit. each observation lasted about a minute.
this sighting occurred at yellow creek lake in a rural area (no city lights) at about 1am.
content.summary: Moving red/orange ball of light.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting home because of unemployment.Decided to look up mufon because i believe in ufo's.What made me notice this event was a posting from peru,indianapolis.I looked through my binoculars and noticed these star like spheres flying,changing direction, and some flying in formation.I was surprised and amazed that the person reporting this was right.I am still watching.Wonder how long this will last?This isn't my first encounter with ufo's and hopefully not my last!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star like objects flying past the sun.

content.detailedDescription:
We were going to the local fireworks.  as we were walking south, to the south east, we noticed golden glowing object.  it was rather stationary at first, as we watched a plane fly past it just to the west.  at first we though it was a planet, then it moved, and became stationary again.  
there was a helicopter in the air, flying over n around watching the traffic, yet the object was higher then the heli.  both the plane and the helicopter were heard, plane faintly due to the crowds, heli more audible.  though the light let out no sound what so ever.

we all were joking with each other that the aliens might be intrested in the fireworks, but after a couple of mins, we were more intrigued in the object then humored.  this was not a natural light, and we kick ourselves for not bringing a camera.

we had to peel our eyes from the sky, and find a place to sit in the madness of all the crowds.  by the time we found a spot, the object was gone.  the heli was still in the area, plane had traveled off into the distance, and the sky was back to its normal self.
content.summary: Bright gold white.

content.detailedDescription: Again seeing objects near sun today, similar to y-day's mass sighting report.  multiple objects, most star or sphere-like, moving in different directions, different speeds, but seem to concentrate near sun.  heard an iu astronomy professor has explained these objects as "comet debris" from comet mcnaught . . . i'm a mufon fi, star team member, and amateur astronomer, but have never encountered "comet debris"  a) in daytime; b) that stops, hovers, and changes course; and c) that sometimes flys in formation!  these objects are high enough that witnesses in other midwestern states should be able to see them if they have clear sky. a large high pressure system is over us today, so am hoping this report will prompt folks to head outside and look (but not directly at sun!)
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Mass sighting of objects near sun continues from y-day over in.

content.detailedDescription:
Please, this is a true story that took place on december 23rd of 2009.  i was in prince albert, saskatchewan and there is a local legend of a ghost train that appears on an old railroad track located in the woods just off an out of town road.  i decided to check it out as i was on my way to town.  it was 1am.  i was driving for a while and i decided i needed a stretch, have a few cigarettes and get back on the road.  i parked just off the road and made my way through the field to the woods.  it was extremely dark.  i heard some quick footsteps.  i got scared but figured it must've been a baby deer or a fox or something.  i remember then smelling a strong odour.  it smelt like chemicals, strong enough to make you cringe and tingle your brain.  that's the last i remember of being in the woods.  i must've passed out but i awoke and i was being led in a dark hallway.  something was communicating with me.  it told me "not to worry," and that "you will not be harmed."  for some reason i trusted it.  the platform we were walking on seemed to cushion my every step.  the creature appeared to be communicating with others but i couldn't see anything else.  finally we approached this spherical room.  we entered but nothing was in there.  just two weird looking seats and the enterance.  a dim bluish light illuminated from above.  at this point, i thought i was dreaming.  the "thing" that was leading me appeared to be some sort of creature.  it invited me into one of the seats as it took the other.  this is where i observed its appearance.  it was very short.  it had dark skin.  it had a large head with two large dark eyes.  it had a visible nose but no visible ears or mouth which is weird because it had a voice. it also had long limbs and long fingers.  it appeared to have some sort of engraving on it's chest.  it also appeared to be injured.  this creature and i had a conversation.  it spoke to me.
it asked me, "what are you?"
i responded, "i'm a human being."
it then asked me, "and this is your home, earth?"
i responded, "yes.  why are you here?"
it paused for some brief moments.  then it said, "because the humans will face the exact same fate that the ithileceus faced.  the creature stated "ithileceus".  i'm guessing that's how you spell it and i'm guessing that's the race of the creature.
i asked, "and what's that?"
it replied, "extinction."
before i asked another question, it continued.  "if the humans don't build an ostisuphrymicous, during the year 2065, they will parish and your world will become their world."
i asked, "what's an os-tis-u-phrym-icous?"
then a small desk appeared from above us and landed in between us.  a small sphere appeared.  it seemed to emit some sort of energy.  the creature just stared at it.  it started to glow and i felt all my energy drain from my body.  then it stopped glowing.  i felt exhausted and vulnerable.  the creature said, "this one was built for use against your kind just in case you happened to portray some level of hostility.  but after some observation, your kind is at most, harmless.  we used the last of our resources to build it."
i can't describe the sphere with words.  i probably could only draw it.  i asked the creature, "where are you from?"
the creature replied, "i am from a place far more advanced than this one.  approximately a thousand times more advanced.  but my home is now home to invaders.  my race was completely destroyed.  i as well as a few others are all that remain in existance."
i asked, "why are you helping us?"
the creature replied, "it is in our nature to aid those that we cross paths with.  it appears that your planet is in a collection of several planets and as a group, appears to be in the path of the invaders that have taken our planet.  i am simply warning you of what's to come."
i still believed i was dreaming.  the creatured seemed to be able to read my thoughts and my feelings.  the creature said, "as victims in a massive slaughtering, this makes us brothers in this universe.  if you don't survive, at least you will die fighting."
i tried to comprehend everything that was being told to me.  but i just couldn't believe it.  the creature extended it's hand out as to shake my hand.  i reached out too and as our hands touched i went unconcious.  the next thing i know, i awoke in my bed.  my clothes were still on, as well as my shoes.  but my watch was missing.  so was my wallet, my phone, my ipod, my cigarettes and my lighter.  i looked outside and my car was nowhere to be found.  i asked a friend to drive me where i had stopped the night before.  my car was still there but nothing else was found.  i called my phone several times using my friend's cell and each time there was an automatic pick-up.  each time i heard a weird humming noise, like a light saber and occasionally a beep.  during the fourth call, it cut and all i got was the operator voice telling me the number was not assigned.  after that day, i had several dreams of a global takeover, more than 6 to be exact.  this incident is truly chilling and disturbing and i've questioned our reality and my existance ever since.  this is a true story.  please believe me.  this incident happened to me.  please e-mail me if you want to see the pictures i drew of the sphere and the creature: [cms/tg/pid]  the creature warned me of the year 2065.
content.summary: This was a ******* abduction.

content.detailedDescription: I was at a stop sign around 11:00 on my way home and looked to the left to see if there were any cars at the stop sign to my left. i saw a bright light coming through some light clouds in the clearing above the road. it was motionless for just a few seconds then it darted suddenly to the left and disappeared behind the tree canopy. it was as large and bright as the moon but its rapid lateral movement ruled that out. i felt that since it was behind the clouds it had enough height to suggest its rapid lateral movement from a stable position would have required great speed. i thought i had seen something extraordinary. i asked my wife who was in front of me in her own vehicle if she had seen any lights in the sky. she mentioned the exact same location but thought it was a plane. i do not think it was a plane.
content.summary: Large light, initially motionless, darted off to left and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I have been taking pictures for over a year now of strange events going on in my own back yard. i first noticed a star that really stood out and started observing it through binoculars. since then, these star like lights have multiplied and produce other strange flying lights. one time, the flying lights came straight at me, making me fall down with my camera but managed to capture it anyway. after observing these for a while, i noticed my back yard motion detector lights going off. for some reason, i don't no why, i goggled orbs and got the information on how to take pictures of these. sure enough, my first night taking pictures with the only intent of capturing orbs, i was shocked. there were hundreds of them, most of them with faces. since then, i have noticed that these orbs are always around when i take pictures of the ufos. the strangest video i took was around feb. 6, 2010 of the strange light in the sky. my friends, who have been the biggest skeptics, have changed their mind when viewing this incredible video. you'll  have to see it to believe it. thank you for this opportunity to tell someone. sincerely, *(wit's name deleted--sgonzalez/cms).
content.shape: Circle,   Cylinder,   Square,   Rectagular,   Triangle,   Other
content.summary: A rectangle with a ball of energy in center that morphs when vibrating.

content.detailedDescription:
This is two events within 21 hours of each other. at approximately 12:40am sunday the 27th my friend and i went outside to talk and we were seated facing west. i was looking up to the southwest a bit when a bright flash of light with a diamond shape object in the middle just appeared. it came in really fast through what i call a portal with a bright flash of light. as it entered it stopped in the sky almost as fast as it came in and floated slowly from my left to right, a south to north movement as i could tell. 

after the initial bright flash of light as it broke into our atmosphere and as it began it's glide/descent, the light quickly faded but not light instant on instant off. it just dimmed but as the celestial craft dimmed it also began to cloak or transform into a small light behind the foliage of the tree. i could see the small light just either go away from me or disappear altogether. my friend witnessed some of the event but not all; from the dimming glide to the small light. this event took about 10 seconds or so.

i was in total awe but the initial reaction i felt was that stir in your stomach and that tinge of fear that comes from seeing something so celestial you just know it is not of this world. i thought. "oh my god" and i exclaimed 'what is that!?!" which was then when my friend pulled the focus. i could see the object/craft so clearly as it entered our airspace, and i say that because i have seen many things concerning outer/inner world phenomenon like fireballs screaming across the sky, meteors striking our atmosphere so hard i could see the outer layer of earth's atmosphere and even sightings of ufo's floating in the sky. this brightness entered our earth and came to a halt as if it was the easiest thing an aircraft could do.

the second sighting came at 9:35pm the very same day, sunday 27th and lasted more or less about a minute. me and my friends jokingly said, "let's sit outside and lets see em again." we looked in the same position and my friend says,"here they come" but in a joking manner because he saw a bright star coming at us. he said it again, and then again and i realized the pitch in his voice changed and this object was moving straight towards us.

it was moving, no gliding across the sky from west(southwest) to east(northeast). it was in perfect view and i could see the diamond shape craft/celestial with a light that was so bright and . . . pure. i mean, i can't really describe it because i have never seen such beautiful white bright light like this celestial emanated. it was smooth as glass and it was so bright and white there was this hue of blue in the center of the diamond shape... incredible beauty of light! it was so . . . pure

it was too early for a star to be this bright. even venus was dim because there was light in the sky still. this was as pure brightness and a color of light i had never seen. as it moved across the sky it was unworldly in its movement. by that i mean unlike any aircraft we know today. not like a plane or even a high flying jet aircraft. they all move with a worldly rhythm but this moved so effortlessly across the sky at a pace that is not of this planet. it glided without movement or turbulence of any kind and the brightness of the light never wavered. it stayed beautiful and bright throughout the course of it's flight until it went out of our vision. it moved from west to east and it was silent and perfect! no sound came from this celestial at all. i ran from one yard to another yard to follow the flight path and i tried videotaping it but i could not capture it. i'll look again but it was dark on camera.

i know something big is happening. it just falls into place with what i know is occurring with the planets. my psychic ability tells me that we are in a transformation for all the human race but now i realize this is on a much larger scale than even i had foreseen.

i am still in awe and i know this is not just another sighting, i just know that. seeing something move across the sky is one thing; watching a diamond craft/celestial enter our airspace, and come to a halt like it did with such ease is another. maybe it didn't know, or care, that i saw it enter but it wanted us/me to see it later that evening. it was clear and not fuzzy, it was close and not far away although i cannot tell the size from its flight. it looked huge when it entered the portal early morning but much smaller when we saw it later. i/we saw it clearly and it was, for lack of better words, beautifully perfect.
content.summary: A bright celestial entered california airspace 1am and later saw the same craft gliding across the sky at 9:35pm.

content.detailedDescription: Tranglar object above the trees on a clear night...Quiet...With a friend...A low lying area...Swamps  near by...Maybe... 6 by 9 feet or less...Flourscent...With no light beaming down. it happened in less than probably 2 seconds. i saw this twice.  my friend has now passed away...I have never in my life ever experienced anything like this. i
content.summary: No noise whatsoever...Passed by twice..Stopped..1 second.

content.detailedDescription:
I didn't know it at the time i took this photo, but there was a disk shaped object just above the treetops as i was driving, as i returned from watching the space shuttle atlantis launch from my vantage point in titusville.

the launch occurred may 11, 2009 at 11:44 a.M. i had never been there before, so  my companion and i wandered around the titusville area for several hours in the shuttle traffic. finally, it was getting late and i meandered to find a highway which would take us back to the orlando area.

i have no idea where i took the shot, except to say i had been working my way westward in the titusville area, and in an area totally foreign to me, followed my instincts and managed to find my way, somehow.

the strange object captured in pixels was positioned at tree level and was not opaque, but rather kind of transparent, with a bluish color, which was most intense around the edges. the view of the trees which seemed to be directly behind the object seem distorted, as if the object affected my view of the trees.

i have never heard of such an observation, and am wondering if there are records of this type of phenomenon.
content.summary: I discovered a strange disk shaped anomaly in a 14 month old photo.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting out in my backyard last night (june 29th, 2010) looking up at the sky and around 10:14 pm when i noticed a light in the south east sky that came out of no where, the odd thing was that you could not see the light until it started getting brighter and brighter after it reached a bright illumination it would gradually fade back out to the point that you could no longer see it. then about 45 to 120 seconds it reapeared in the exact same way, but this time it had moved what i would say was about 50 feet down and slightly left. after it faded out the second time it reappeared once again in the same way but this time it had moved upward and to the right and had traveled an even farther distance than the first time (you could not see the object move at all), then it proceeded to fade out yet again. then it appeared again this time almost straight down what seemed about 40 to 50 feet. it continued to keep this up for 6 to 7 times each time it would relocate continuing to have moved a large distance with no set time between each appearance. after 6 or 7 times i never saw it again.
content.summary: Evolving light that you could not see, it would get brighter and brighter when it reached a certain point it would fade out to nothing, then did the same but had moved and did this about 6 times.

content.detailedDescription: I received a call from *(name and other info deleted--sgonzalez/cms) at 11:07 am this morning.  (i was at work and had just gone on my break)  he asked me to look outside and in the area of the sun and tell him what i could see.  he stated that he and his wife were in indy on medical business and that another person seeing these things was in lafayette.  i went outside and at first glance didn't seen anything except some cotton wood flying, some bugs and a few flying spider webs, all flying with the air current and looking quite pretty in the bright sun and clear blue sky.  then suddenly i happened to notice something quite different.  the object i saw moved out from the corona of the sun was clearly a much higher altitude than the bugs and other debris flying around.  this object was moving against the air current that was propelling the other debris in the air.  it stopped. held steady it's position for well over one minute (which is like a century when you are watching, btw) and then proceeded to move back into the sun, where i was no longer able to see it.  it was quite large.  with that, there appeared a whole host of other odd moving "things��� at one point there were so many that it gave the sun the appearance of an atom with all the molecules circling about it.  it was that kind of movement and it was simply spectacular to watch.  i���m my 51 years, i have enver seen anything like it.  i had to go back in to work at 11:30 am and it was still going strong.  i want back outside again at 1 pm and it was still going on.  by 1:45 pm it seemed to be waning.  a number of other employees wandered outside and watched the show, as well.  i would estimate that at least 15 people that i know of went outside and observed the strange lights.  like i said, i did see a lot of cotton wood flying about.  as well as bugs and, to my surprise, quite a lot of spider web material.  i have read about the high air spider webs before but never seen them until today.  they were very pretty to watch.  but not anomalous in nature
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multiple orbs circling the sun.

content.detailedDescription: At around 11 pm on april 3, 2010 i stepped outside to get some air, and i looked to the south and noticed a orange orb like light near the horizon. i ran inside and grabbed my cell phone and the digital camera, and came back outside, and saw that it was gone. so i waited for about 3 minutes, and it reappeared to the south-southwest as an orange orb, then it disappeared again, but just shortly after, reappeared, this time much closer. i watched it get closer, less than a mile now, as the orange light dimmed and i started to see three white lights in a small triangular formation with a red blinking light in the center, when it was directly over me, i could just barely make out an actual shape to the object (triangle), and this time, i could actually hear a low decible humming sound, though very faint, when the object started to move away from me in a northerly direction, i did not notice any other lights on it, none on the rear, i attempted to take a picture, but it did not show up. i got on my cell phone and called 911 and let them know that a strange light in the sky was headed towards vincennes.
content.summary: My 3rd triangle ufo.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 11:30 pm eastern time on november 20, 2009 near vincennes, in, i stepped outside to get some fresh air, i decided to go pet our cats, and i looked to the southeast and noticed what appeared to be an orange orb off in the distance, so i my curiousity caused me to keep my eyes on it, but as it approached slowly, the orange orb like light dimmed, and a bright white spot light came on, and was shinning on the ground, i ran inside and grabbed our telescope to see if i could make out any details. as i came back out, it was really close, less than a mile away, it appeared to be anywhere from 500-1,000 feet above the ground and moving at about 50 to 100 mph. i set up the telescope and was able to find it (it is very difficult to follow moving objects in telescopes), i could see three white lights (not flashing) in a triangle formation, and a red blinking light between the center and rear. but then it started make strange manauvers, it appeared to bank to the right and actually roll completely upside down and then roll back over (did not make a 100% roll manauver). i'm not sure how many times it did this, but it was alot. it also decended 50 or 100 feet several times and then ascend back to the altitude it was at, almost in the blink of an eye. there was no sound at all, even though it was almost directly overhead, it banked over to the left and the back to the right and continued northbound in a straight bath towards vincennes. i ran inside to grab my camera but when i came back outside, it was gone. i did strongly think it might have been an aircraft having problems, but considering how it decended and ascended almost instantly, gives me very little doubt it was any aircraft that i know of.
content.summary: Triangle ufo (possibly damaged).

content.detailedDescription: Standing on our pier on little cedar lake just looking at the stars, we were looking north and saw a glittery red oval/circle rise above the tree line, we thought it was a plane but there was no sound, within about 20 seconds a second one rose up behind it.  they slowly rose and went west up into the sky towards a large black cloud and could not see anymore due to it being too far away.  we watched and ended up seeing at least 18 of these over the coarse of 20 minutes prior to going into the house (there could have been more but the mosquitos were getting too bad) like i said we intially thought these were planes but there ended up being too many of them and it was silent. we would see one rise and then another would shortly follow and they would all follow the same path of floating up into the sky while going west.  there seemed to be about a minute and half wait before we would see the next one rise and then one follow in about 20-30 seconds.  they all looked alike.  there is no airport in the area and then we considered if they could have been some sort of weather balloon.  there were 6 of us tht witnessed this and none of us have ever seen anything like it. they all seemed to have the same pattern and float up and rise very controlled and at the same speed. we were all excited by it and also baffled since we could not figure out what this could be and are unsure who to ask.
content.summary: 18 glittering red ovals/circles rising from horizon about 2 minutes apart, usually 2  about 20 seconds apart.

content.detailedDescription: We were in gettysburg,and i took allot of photo's,i did not notice it at the time the photo was taken,it was in the afternoon hours,maybe around 6:00 it was afterwards at home going through them i noticed it.
content.summary: We were in gettysburg and i took a lot of photos.
